questions.question: What is the overall shape of the main body of the hook?
What appears to be the primary material used in its construction?
What is the predominant color or finish of the product?
Considering the visible surface, what is the apparent texture of the metal?
How many individual hooks are visibly present on the product?
Describe the visible shape of the individual hook projections?

What is the general style of this object (modern, rustic, etc.)?

Based on the visual appearance, is the finish of the product matte or glossy?

Does the object display any visible markings or branding?
Considering the size, how many items can the hooks reasonably hold?
